abstract: Alibaba may want to buy back Yahoo’s stake in the Chinese Web company, but it seems the tech giant has no intention of granting that wish.
snippet: Alibaba may want to buy back Yahoo’s stake in the Chinese Web company, but it seems the tech giant has no intention of granting that wish.
lead_paragraph: Alibaba may want to buy back Yahoo‘s stake in the Chinese Web company, but it seems the American tech giant has no intention of granting that wish.

headline.main: Yahoo Shows No Interest in Selling Alibaba Stake
